short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME. ENVIRONMENT AND CLIMATE CHANGE CANADA HAS REQUIRMENT FOR A CEILOMETER WITH DEPOLARIZATION.
description: ENVIRONMENT AND CLIMATE CHANGE CANADA HAS FALLBACK POSITION ON SUPPLY, DELIVERY, AND OFFLOADING(SHIPMENT) OF , (1) ONE CEILOMETER WITH DEPOLARIZATION FROM SOURCE TO RUNNING AT EDINBURG, ALBERTA.
